headline: AppLovin (APP) Positioned for Ad Growth Beyond Gaming, Says Jefferies
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight for Investors. On December 11, Jefferies raised its price target on the stock to $860.00 from $800.00 while maintaining a “Buy” rating. Analysts at the firm see strong ad growth potential for AppLovin, citing confidence in margin scalability and expansion beyond gaming. Jefferies has […]
